Question.Subject: Prove of resell right?
Question.Content: There are many sites which offer ebooks with resell right,how can I know it is legitimate so that I can resell them?What's the prove to show that I have resell right for a book?
Question.ChosenAnswer: eBooks with resell rights usually come with a license that tells you what you can do and can't do with the ebooks. If you doubt about the license, you may contact the author to confirm.

Answer.Content: eBooks with resell rights usually come with a license that tells you what you can do and can't do with the ebooks. If you doubt about the license, you may contact the author to confirm.
